name: My Example Source
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: homeworkout
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows us to use your location to show your walks and runs on a map.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: We would like to use your camera to take a photo as your avatar.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows the Home Workouts app to provide you with the most relevant recommendations and ads
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Your data about weight, height and active energy will be shared with Apple Health.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: To ensure the accuracy of tracking
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Home Workout needs this access to save images to your album.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Your data about weight, steps and heart rate will be synced from Apple Health.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This allows you to listen to music on your phone while you exercise.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allows us to use your location to show your walks and runs on a map.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This allows us to use your location to show your walks and runs on a map.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Home Workout needs this access to update your avatar, share photos and save images to you album.

news.title: New Feature Announcement
news.caption: Introducing a new feature in AltStore!
